column4: Can somebody helping me, to connect to another PC via ssh? I already created my dsa public key in the client PC, now whats the 2nd step?
I'm doing $ssh user@192.168.1.2, and it asks me for a password, what password?
Your password on the remote box.
You mean the password of the user called "user" right?
BUt it has to be "user"'s password from the computer you're trying to connect to, not the local password.
In the server PC I have a user called user01, and he has his password.. I'm using this password and this user to log on
I dont know whats happening then
Try making a new user on the server, just to make sure you're not just messing up password or something.
Intangir: I got it..... wrong case :$
22 here or in the remote PC (server) ?
22 remotely, but don't mess with it, you've got it setup now.
If I want to enter to that PC but using the X, is there a way using ssh? I think ssh -x ?
If you want to actually connect to the environment, I suggest instead sshing there, then executing "x11vnc"
